tags.name: Media
tags.description: Retrieve media content from a message

parameters.description: Phone number for connection. Must have + prefix.
parameters.name: phoneNumber

clientName.description: Name of the client to be used on WhatsApp connection

includeMedia.description: Include media in messages.upsert event payload as base64 string

syncFullHistory.description: Sync full history of messages on connection.

type.description: Presence type. `available` is automatically reset to `unavailable` after 60s. `composing` and `recording` are automatically held for ~25s by WhatsApp. `paused` can be used to reset `composing` and `recording` early.

post.description: Sends read receipts for the provided message keys. Currently only supports sending `received` event. For `read` receipts, use `read-messages` endpoint.

parameters.name: messageId
